name: Durendal (Legate Studio)
description:
Durendal is an action-adventure based on the medieval ballad "The Song of Roland", set in the VIII century around franko-arabic war waged by Charlemagne. You will take control over his best knight and nephew Roland. Dash and slash through the hordes of pagans to defend your uncle's newfound Empire and uncover a deadly plot in the court.

CLEANSING FLAMES Prologue - AVAILABLE NOW

In this short demo mission you will meet Roland and turn the tide of the battle for enemy capital city Cordoba.

System Requirements

Minimal:

OS: Windows 10/11 (never ran on 7, try it out and send feedback using the link in the folder)

CPU: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 5 1600

RAM: 8 GB

VRAM: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 6 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 8GB

DirectX: 11 or more

Disk free space: 11 GB

Recommended

OS: Windows 10/11

CPU:  INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 7 3800X

RAM: 16 GB 

VRAM: NVIDIA GEFORCE  RYX 3080 10 GB or AMD RADEON RX 6000 16 GB

DirectX: 11 or more

Disk free space: 11 GB
